title: Toffee Crunch Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1 egg, lightly beaten', '125g caster sugar', 'dash salt', '240ml milk', '100g plain chocolate, melted and cooled', '160ml whipping cream', '2 tablespoons strong filter coffee', '3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '80g Dime bars, crushed', '40g chopped pecans']
